mapper.select: SELECT /* mgkim.proto.www.cmm.mapper.CmmReloadableConfMngMapper.selectReloadStateList */ SITE_TPCD , HOSTNAME , WAS_ID , CONF_ID , CONF_STCD , APLI_DTTM , APLI_RDTTM , FIRST_REGIR_NO , FIRST_REGI_DTTM , LAST_MODFR_NO , LAST_MODF_DTTM FROM MGCB401TS /* MGCB_reloadable-config상태 */ WHERE SITE_TPCD = #{siteTpcd} AND HOSTNAME = #{hostname} AND WAS_ID = #{wasId}
mapper.update: MERGE /* mgkim.proto.www.cmm.mapper.CmmReloadableConfMngMapper.updateReloadStateForReset */ INTO MGCB401TS /* MGCB_reloadable-config상태 */ USING DUAL ON (SITE_TPCD = #{siteTpcd} AND HOSTNAME = #{hostname} AND WAS_ID = #{wasId} AND CONF_ID = #{confId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CONF_STCD = '00' , APLI_DTTM = null , APLI_RDTTM = null , LAST_MODFR_NO = 'SYSTEM' , LAST_MODF_DTTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SITE_TPCD , HOSTNAME , WAS_ID , CONF_ID , CONF_STCD , APLI_DTTM , APLI_RDTTM , FIRST_REGIR_NO , FIRST_REGI_DTTM , LAST_MODFR_NO , LAST_MODF_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{siteTpcd} , #{hostname} , #{wasId} , #{confId} , '00' , null , null , 'SYSTEM' , SYSDATE , 'SYSTEM' , SYSDATE )
